scripts.build: yarn run build:docker:build && yarn run build:docker:save
scripts.build:docker:save: shx mkdir -p dist && shx rm -f dist/docker-image.tar.gz && docker save spear-ai/dev-image --output dist/docker-image.tar.gz
scripts.check: yarn run lint && yarn run test
scripts.dev: yarn run build && yarn run start
scripts.test: yarn run test:direnv && yarn run test:docker && yarn run test:docker-compose && yarn run test:git && yarn run test:fnm && yarn run test:node && yarn run test:ubuntu && yarn run test:yarn && yarn run test:pyenv && yarn run test:python && yarn run test:poetry && yarn run test:pulumi && yarn run test:vim
scripts.test:node: docker run -it spear-ai/dev-image fnm list | grep 18.12.1
scripts.test:pulumi: docker run -it spear-ai/dev-image pulumi version | grep 3.48.0
scripts.test:yarn: echo 'TODO: Figure out how to run `fnm` deterministically in order to test Yarn. See: https://github.com/Schniz/fnm/issues/838'
